name: Santa Runner (itch)
description:
Intro

Ever wonder how Santa's reindeer stay in the air?

They're powered by Holiday Cheer!

Deliver presents without destroying Santa's sled. Toss presents at chimneys to gain Cheer and power your sled and get the highest score of your friends! 

Gameplay

Shoot presents at chimneys and dodge buildings!

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

LeftClick (Can hold down) - Shoot

Credits

Code Jasi - Music
Watusi - UI/3d Art
Bo (Intradom) Zhang - Unity Programming
Evan (Crychair) Malmud - Unity Programming
Sebastien (Mahjoub) Gaumin - Unity Programming
